sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar class="ios hydrated">
    <ion-title class="ios title-ios hydrated">Booking</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>
<ion-content>
  <ion-list lines="full">
    <form [formGroup]="citaForm" (ngSubmit)="saveCita()">
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Paciente</ion-label>
        <ion-input formControlName="paciente" type="text" required></ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Correo</ion-label>
        <ion-input formControlName="correo" type="text" required>
        </ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Celular</ion-label>
        <ion-input formControlName="celular" type="text" required>
        </ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="primary" shape="full" expand="block">Agendar Cita</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="danger" shape="full" expand="block" routerLink="/home">Cancelar</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
    </form>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
